      • parseDecimal

        public static java.lang.String parseDecimal(java.lang.String decimal,
                                            int length)
        Returns a string for shortened decimal
        Parameters:
        decimal - Decimal to shorten
        length - Amount of characters after the ., will add on 0's to meet minimum
        Returns:
        Input: "5978.154123" (Length of 3) Output: "5978.154"
